ComicInfo.Title: The Ultimate Freedom
ComicInfo.Summary:
Contains:
Plop Celebrates
Super Plops
The Ultimate Freedom
People Plops
Prison Plops
Prescription Plops
His Honour the Mayor
Monster Plops
Moulded in Evil
The hosts encounter the Easter Bunny, who doesn't understand the meaning of "plop." To explain, they share stories with the Bunny.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 10:16:56. [CVDB56585]
ComicInfo.Writer: Coram Nobis, Bill Reilly, Ed Noonchester, George Kashdan, Sergio Aragonés, Steve Skeates
ComicInfo.Penciller: Sergio Aragonés, Mike Sekowsky, Bernie Wrightson, Bernie Wrightson, John Albano, Mike Sekowsky, Murphy Anderson, Sergio Aragonés
ComicInfo.Inker: Sergio Aragonés, Mike Sekowsky, Bernie Wrightson, Bernie Wrightson, John Albano, Mike Sekowsky, Murphy Anderson, Sergio Aragonés
ComicInfo.Characters: Abel, Barry Allen, Batman, Cain, Dick Grayson, Eve, Gregory, Lois Lane, Supergirl, Superman, The Easter Bunny
